text: Greg Dyke is a British journalist. He was the director-general of the BBC from January 2000 to January 2004. From 2013 to 2016 he was chairman of the Football Association. He was chancellor of the University of York from 2004 to 2015 and chairman of the British Film Institute between 2008 and 2016. ==References== Category:Journalists from London Category:BBC people Category:1947 births
title: Greg Dyke
